item.title: Refugee Writers Workshop at the Goethe Institut
item.description: Last week, we were privileged to be invited to the Goethe Institut in Sofia, Bulgaria, to run a workshop for refugee writers in collaboration with Caritas Sofia. After a year of lockdown and semi-lockdown here in Bulgaria, it was a genuine pleasure to be getting back to working with people face-to-face.
